Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on his reelection as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK at the First Session of the 11th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
 The letter was handed today to an official concerned by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, doyen of the corps.
